text: The 1961 Honduran Amateur League was the 14th edition of the Honduran Amateur League. Club Deportivo Olimpia obtained its 4th national title.RadioHouse.hn – ¿Sabes cuantos títulos ha ganado Olimpia en realidad? – 28 July 2016 The season ran from 9 March 1961 to 19 November 1961.DiarioMas.hn – Los 37 títulos de liga del Olimpia en base a ley – 12 July 2016 ==Regional champions== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Regional championship !! Champions |- | Atlántida || Palermo |- | Cortés || Independiente |- | Francisco Morazán || Olimpia |- | Yoro || Lenca |} ===Known results=== ==National championship round== Played in a double round-robin format between the regional champions. Also known as the Cuadrangular.DiarioMas.hn – Olimpia vs Motagua en los campeonatos olvidados de 1947 a 1964 – 22 August 2016 ===Known results=== ==Olimpia's lineup== ==References== Category:Liga Amateur de Honduras seasons Honduras Category:1961 in Honduran sport
title: 1961 Honduran Amateur League
